title: Constructivist-Based Distance Science Project Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Constructivist approach applied to strengthen self-directed learning competencies in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: For scientific problem-solving, learners can improve project deliverables by engaging in peer feedback three or more times using smartphone-based collaboration tools.
Based on constructivist principles, learners can write reflective journals 10+ times linking everyday experiences to scientific theories.
In formative assessments conducted every two weeks, learners can revise and improve self-directed learning plans with over 80% achievement.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
